$datasource = RequestUtilities::getRequestParamValue('datasource');
        $sql = 'SELECT
                  release_approved_year AS year,
                  SUM(agreement_total_amount) AS total_amount,
                  SUM(agreement_original_amount) AS original_amount,
                  SUM(agreement_spend_to_date) AS spent_to_date
                FROM all_agreement_transactions
                WHERE agreement_type_id = 3 AND release_approved_year BETWEEN 2013 AND 2018
                GROUP BY release_approved_year
                ORDER BY 1 ASC';
        $node->data  = _checkbook_project_execute_sql($sql,'main',$datasource);
